title: Eva Longoria wears an LBD and sexy boots as she heads to Mr Chow
text:
Eva Longoria looked incredible in a black dress and killer leather boots as she headed out for dinner at Mr Chow in London on Thursday.

The 44-year-old showed off her stunning figure as she hopped out of a London cab to arrive solo at the iconic eatery.

Her outing comes after Eva spoke about her friendships with fellow celebrities Cheryl, 36, and Victoria Beckham, 44.

Walking tall: Eva Longoria wore an LBD and sexy boots as she headed to Mr Chow in London for dinner on Thursday after discussing her friendships with Cheryl and Victoria Beckham

She told Metro that she wants to plan a playdate with her son Santiago and Cheryl's son, Bear, two.

She said: '[Cheryl] is such a laugh and I really enjoy her company. We were talking baby things, because we're both obsessed with our baby boys. We should have had a playdate while I was here!'

And she also revealed that her BFF Victoria is someone she turns to for parenting advice, given that she's had four children of her own.

Working it: Eva looked fashion forward as she made a solo exit out of a London taxi

She's got it going on: She slung her coat over her arm as she made her very stylish arrival

She said: 'Victoria's an amazing mum. She's probably one of the first people I do turn to for advice for things.

'Plus her kids are older so she's already been through all the stages already. Harper's in love with Santi so that helps too. I have a built in babysitter.'

Eva welcomed her first child with her husband Jose Baston, who is the president of Televisa, the largest media company in Latin America, just over a year ago.

Cute: She recently said she wants to plan a playdate with her son Santiago and Cheryl's son, Bear, two

There for her: Eva also said that she turns to mother-of-four BFF Victoria Beckham for advice on parenting

The Texas-born beauty tied the knot with the 51-year-old on May 21, 2016 in Mexico after meeting on a blind date set up by a mutual friend.

Eva previously revealed how much motherhood had changed her 'in every way' in an interview with Haute Living.

'Everything is different' she said. 'You're no longer the centre of your universe. Now, everything revolves around him and his schedule and his needs - happily so.'

Watch your step: Eva was very careful with her footing as she stepped out of the taxi
